content: संघर्षः {@--1@} Rubbing together, friction. {@--2@} Grinding, trituration. {@--3@} Collision, clash. {@--4@} Emulation, rivalry, contest for superiority; तस्याश्च मम च कस्तिंश्चित्संघर्षे <ls>Dk.</ls>; नाट्याचार्ययोर्महान् ज्ञानसंघर्षो जातः <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Envy, jealousy. {@--6@} Gliding, gently flowing.
